org.grouplens.lenskit.specs

Interface SpecHandler<T>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DataSourceSpecHandler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CrossfoldSpecHandler, GenericTTSpecHandler, PackedDataSourceSpecHandler, PreferenceDomainBuilder, TextDataSourceSpecHandler

    public interface SpecHandler<T>
    Base interface for building objects from specifications. Individual object configurator interfaces will extend this interface, and their implementations will be resolved using ServiceLoader.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T buildFromSpec(SpecificationContext context, com.typesafe.config.Config cfg)
      Build an object from a configuration.
      boolean handlesType(java.lang.String type)
      Ask if this configurator can handle the specified type.

    • Method Detail

      • handlesType

        boolean handlesType(java.lang.String type)
        Ask if this configurator can handle the specified type.
        Parameters:
        type - The name of the type.
        Returns:
        true if this configurator can handle a configuration with the specified type (as its type key).

      • buildFromSpec

        T buildFromSpec(SpecificationContext context,
              com.typesafe.config.Config cfg)
                throws SpecificationException
        Build an object from a configuration.
        Parameters:
        context - The configuration context.
        cfg - The configuration.
        Returns:
        The configured object.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if cfg is not a configuration of this type of object.
        SpecificationException - if there is an error in the configuration.
